name: Oliver's Ore Mining Simulator! (v0.2.1)
description:
This is a Mining Simulator when you collect different ores and sell them for good prices! Alot of content is to be added so for now, enjoy the game :)

v0.2.1 Release (15/04/18):

Added labels under the ores saying how rare the ores are (Common, Uncommon, Rare). Multiple bug fixes have been patched and the overall game has been polished.

v0.2 Release (14/04/18):

You can now increase the value of an ore by investing it, adding investment into the game :) The next update should include more upgrades!

v0.1 BETA Released (10/04/18)!

The game is now in BETA!
